references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational concept for the RATD model's time series forecasting approach.

references.paper_title: CSDI: Conditional score-based diffusion models for probabilistic time series imputation
references.reason: This paper is the main baseline model for the RATD paper and proposes a relevant method for time series forecasting that incorporates diffusion models.

references.paper_title: MG-TSD: Multi-granularity time series diffusion models with guided learning process
references.reason: This paper presents another closely-related approach that uses a multi-granularity time series diffusion model, providing a comparative approach to the methods presented in the RATD paper.

references.paper_title: Non-autoregressive conditional diffusion models for time series prediction
references.reason: This paper provides a comparative non-autoregressive method, which the RATD model improves upon.

references.paper_title: N-BEATS: Neural basis expansion analysis for interpretable time series forecasting
references.reason: This paper presents a significant baseline method for time series forecasting and provides an additional perspective that is comparable to the RATD method.
